mapper.insert: insert into orders (uID, oADDRESS, oDATE, oNAME, oPOST, oTOTAL, oPHONE) values (#{uid }, #{oaddress },now() ,#{oname }, #{opost }, #{ototal }, #{ophone })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders_detail LEFT JOIN product on product.pNO = orders_detail.pNO WHERE uid=#{uid } ORDER BY oNO AND pCATEGORY;
